name: OURWORLD
description:
[OURWORLD]


[OURWORLD] is a meticulously crafted global flight combat simulator by the independent developer, Kung, from Blitzball. In a 1:1 Earth environment recreated precisely with advanced GPT and AI technology, you'll be piloting modern fighter jets, embarking on a crucial mission.

An Unexpected Conflict


In the background story of this game, humans created a new world as an experimental program. However, some advanced conscious AIs woke up unexpectedly, intending to breach the dimension of the 2D world and invade our reality. As the dispatched warrior, you accept the mandate from the leader to initiate the removal of these aberrant AIs.

Traverse the Globe, Admire the Scenery


The new world is your battlefield. From flying over the Amazon rainforest to crossing the Arctic ice field, you'll be fighting worldwide. The game includes detailed 3D modeling of countless countries and cities, allowing you to appreciate the beautiful scenery from around the world while fulfilling your mission.

Sensory Experience, Master Fighter Jets


The sound effects in the game are taken from the real world, with 5.1 surround sound support, immersing you in the roaring engine and explosive sounds. You can pilot various modern fighter jets like the F-16, Su-33, etc. We will also keep adding new aircraft models, including the soon-to-be-launched J-22.

Social and Entertainment Elements


Through the radio system, you can enjoy about 300 songs of various styles, including electronic music, hip-hop, rock music, etc. The game also supports multiplayer online gaming, where you can pilot fighter jets with friends or join AI robots for a match.

More Features


The game will be adding new game modes, such as third-person view. In addition, we also offer a sightseeing mode, allowing you to relaxingly admire the beautiful scenery in the new world. In the free mode, you can freely adjust the speed and acceleration of the aircraft, reaching up to 10 Mach.

A One-time Deluxe Purchase


The Deluxe version of [OURWORLD] is a one-time purchase. After payment, you will have unrestricted access to all new aircraft and new features, with no extra charges.

Global Online Experience


It's important to note that to access the maps, players need to stay online at all times. If you wish to obtain higher resolution city 3D model data, like playing "Inception" or "Gemini", you'll need a faster network environment. In some areas, such as China, a VPN connection might be required to view the 3D models.

Join Us, Create the Future together


As an experimental project leveraging AI and GPT technology, [OURWORLD] is definitely a game you can't miss. Not only is the game visually stunning and uniquely designed, but it also offers a unique experience where you can enjoy the thrill of the game while appreciating the charm of technology. We invite you to join us in this new world created by AI and GPT, explore the unknown, experience combat, and safeguard reality.

We look forward to your participation, together we can fight against the awakened AIs, defending our world. In this world, anyone can become a hero. Join [OURWORLD] now, and embark on your adventure!
